title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: As the pace of life changes, you may need to recapture your own rhythm. Maybe someone springs a surprising request that catches you off guard. Or, youre thrown a curveball at work that distracts you from your long list of tasks. All kinds of unexpected behavior is possible when unpredictable Uranus breaks the control of the Scorpio Sun in your 7th House of Others. But your job isnt to regain dominance over current circumstances. Instead, its to return to your own practice of self-mastery. Step away from the chaos to listen to the reliable beat of your own heart and breath. Tune out the external noise and dance to your inner drummer. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
